thig3.8:1.1_0: “The hermits should be attained by a hermit,
thig3.8:1.3_0: not by fingers nor by nails,
thig3.8:2.3_0: When he has reached the goal,
thig3.8:2.4_0: as they rightly discern the Dhamma.
thig3.8:3.2_0: the mass of darkness was shattered.
thig3.8:5.1_0: The Book of the Threes is finished.
